column4: Hi, my sound doesn't seem to be working; I was playing with my hidden home files earlier. Sound works in another user
sound preferences in panel
what about it?
is it muted ^^
check the card you have and the card it's using
nope, and the volumes are up
and the sound works on another user, so it shouldn't be the card
it was working an hour ago
what did you do
oh, delete a few files here and there... LOL
I thought it would be safe if I removed things from my home folder, but apparently not
did you somehow achieve deleting sound preferences for your user?
like the ones that starts with .
yes. The odd thing is I hear sound for a bit and then it cuts off
the expected sound*
.. why would you do that?
asdjaputra... blame my stupidity
plus a lot of configs for programs I don't use any more so
yes i will :P the problem's there
but sorry idk when it comes to config files
what do you think programs I should look into? I've looked through alsa
and cleaned out pulse
steal sound config files from another user :P
seriously i can't help
